From September 1st 11AM ET - September 8th 11AM ET, earn twice the XP from Trials and Emblems.

news.description:
The Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil: PROJECT W Collection features several classic looks - and characters - from the legendary series:

  • Ada Wong - Undercover Espionage
  • Rebecca Chambers - Cowgirl Outfit

  • Purple Vial: Purchase 2 Outfits
  • Red Vial: Purchase 3 Outfits
news.title: PROJECT W Collection

news.description:
It pays to have a partner you can trust.
The PROJECT W Collection brings a pair of beloved Resident Evil characters into The Fog, as well as 2 iconic ensembles for Jill and Leon.
Legendary:
  • Jill Valentine - Sheva Alomar
  • Leon Kennedy - Carlos Oliveira

    • Very Rare:
  • Jill Valentine - S.T.A.R.S. Uniform
  • Leon Kennedy - Detective Noir
    • Receive Charms by purchasing outfits from the Resident Evil: PROJECT W Chapter:
  • Blue Vial: Purchase 1 Outfit
  • Purple Vial: Purchase 2 Outfits
  • Red Vial: Purchase 3 Outfits
news.title: PROJECT W Collection

news.description:
Feng Min and Felix Richter have picked up a few survival tips from S.T.A.R.S.

The Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil: PROJECT W Collection features iconic outfits from the legendary franchise:
Very Rare:
  • Feng Min - Jill Cosplay
  • Felix Richter - S.T.A.R.S. Uniform

    • Receive Charms by purchasing outfits from the Resident Evil: PROJECT W Chapter:
  • Blue Vial: Purchase 1 Outfit
  • Purple Vial: Purchase 2 Outfits
  • Red Vial: Purchase 3 Outfits
news.title: PROJECT W Collection

news.description:
Progress will be achieved, and Uroboros is the key.

Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil: PROJECT W is here, featuring 3 new characters:
  • Albert Wesker (The Mastermind) - Killer
  • Ada Wong - Survivor
  • Rebecca Chambers - Survivor

    • Purchase this Chapter to receive an exclusive Charm: The Green Vial.

    Raccoon City Police Department Rework:
    Renovations are officially complete. The Raccoon City Police Department Map has undergone a complete quality of life rework. It's now split into two separate Maps built around the West and East Wings, with each version featuring a different arrangement of rooms.

    Experience true evolution with Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil: PROJECT W.
news.title: NEW CHAPTER

news.description:
Welcome to Chapter 25! Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you\'ll find.

For a full list of patch notes, please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes

FEATURES
  • New Killer - The Mastermind

  • New Survivor - Ada Wong

  • New Survivor - Rebecca Chambers

  • Added Streamer Options

  • Improved Network Connection Indicators

  • Enabled Matchmaking Incentives

  • Added Photosensitivity Warning


    • PERKS
  • Reverted changes to Mettle of Man

  • Changed the behaviour of Blast Mine when it times out without being triggered


    • CONTENT
  • The Racoon City Police Station map has now become two maps: Raccoon City Police Station East Wing and Raccoon City Police Station West Wing


    • BUG FIXES
  • Fixed an issue that caused some players to have incorrect perk levels after the prestige rework

  • Fixed an issue that caused Survivors to float after being grabbed by the killer

  • Fixed an issue that caused broken animation when repairing a generator

  • Fixed several issues related to The Cenobite\'s Lament Configuration

  • Fixed several issues related to scoring events being incorrect or not occurring

  • Fixed an issue where Killers would briefly remain falling after landing

  • Fixed a collision issue in the Mother\'s Dwelling map

  • Fixed an issue where players could get stuck in a specific spot in the Eyrie of Crows map


    • KNOWN ISSUES
  • The description for Tier 1 of the perk Hyperfocus displays the wrong value

  • The headline and subtitles for some Store banners is displayed as placeholder text
news.title: Release Patch Notes

news.description:
Find love or die trying in Hooked on You: A Dead by Daylight Dating Sim, the first visual novel based on the Dead by Daylight universe!

Upon purchasing Hooked on You, players will receive a code for the Captured Heart Charm and Jake Park\'s beach-ready Surf Survivor Outfit.

Code to be received on your BHVR Account Website: https://account.bhvr.com/auth/signin

To celebrate the release of Hooked on You, you can earn bonus XP from your first match of the day (per role) and 1.5x Bloodpoints from August 3rd 3PM - August 10th 3PM ET!

Get Hooked on You on Steam NOW!

Steam Store Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1866180/
news.title: Hooked on You Release

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 6.1.2 bugfix.

Some platforms will receive version 6.1.2 while others will jump straight to 6.1.3. These versions are largely the same with the latter including an additional fix for the Bloodweb. This will not affect crossplay: Everyone can play together, no matter which version they have!

Perks
  • Changes to Thanatophobia, Mettle of Man, Pain Resonance, and Dead Man\'s Switch


    • Content
  • Re-enabled The Clown

  • Replaced the Orange Glyph "Glyph Massacre" challenge for a Red Glyph "Glyph Seeker" challenge in Tome 12, Level 1


    • Bug Fixes
  • Fixed an issue with The Clown

  • Fixed an issue with the interaction between Overcharge and Call of Brine perks

  • Fixed issues with Hex: No One Escapes Death, Dead Hard, and Off the Record

  • Fixed issues related to the Bloodweb


    • Known Issues
  • The Inner Focus perk fails to reveal the Killer\'s aura when the condition is met.


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 6.1.2 BUGFIX

  • Fixed several issues related to The Doctor

news.description:
The winter holidays on the horizon, and we need your help choosing the direction of the next Winter Collection.

On one hand, a Collection inspired by fantasy and fairytales - think snow queens and nutcrackers. On the other, a Collection focused on cozy holiday nights by the fire - snug PJs and ugly sweaters galore.

Whichever Collection receives the most votes will be released during the 2022 winter holiday season. Voting starts now and ends on July 25th at 11AM ET.

Vote for your choice here: https://woobox.com/i4a87m
news.title: Winter Collection Poll

news.description:
The Attack on Titan Collection is here, featuring 10 new outfits inspired by your favorite characters from the series. Forge your path by journeying through the Cadets Corps or wreaking havoc as a Titan - the choice is yours.

Unlocking outfits from the Attack on Titan Collection will earn you up to five Charms. Check out further details on how to unlock each one below:
Cadet Corps Crest: Login gift during the Mid-Chapter release period*
Garrison Regiment Crest: Unlocking any AoT Survivor outfit
Wall Titan: Unlocking any AoT Killer outfit
Military Police Regiment Crest: Unlocking any 2 AoT outfits
Scout Regiment Crest: Unlocking any 3 AoT outfits.

*Upon the release of Chapter 25, this Charm will be unlocked with purchase of any AoT outfit.

The below bonuses will also be active during this event period!
  • Double Rift Fragments: 2 per 500 XP earned (Starting July 20th 11AM ET alongside Tome 12 release)

  • Bloodpoint Login Rewards: 50,000 per day (July 20th 11AM ET - 27th 11AM ET)

  • First Match of the Day Bonus XP: 1,000 XP per role


    • See you in The Fog!

    Duration: July 19th 11AM ET - July 27th 11AM ET
news.title: Attack on Titan Release Event

news.description:
This update is a real game-changer. Major Perk changes, a new progression system, and much more have come to Dead by Daylight.

Learn about all the changes: forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes
news.title: Perk & Progression Updates

news.description:
This update is a real game-changer. Major Perk changes, a new progression system, and much more have come to Dead by Daylight.

Learn about all the changes: forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes
news.title: Perk & Progression Updates

news.description:
Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you\'ll find.

For a full list of patch notes, please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes

CONTENT
  • "Tome 12: DISCORDANCE" of The Archives (starts July 20th 11AM ET)

  • Added more maze tiles to the pool in the McMillan Estate map


    • GAMEPLAY
  • Generators now take longer to repair

  • The following Killer actions have been sped up: kicking pallets and walls, kicking generators, and the cooldown after a successful hit

  • Survivors now get a speed boost and endurance for a short time after being unhooked.


    • PERKS
  • Many perks have received changes this update! Check the full patch notes for more details.


    • PROGRESSION
  • Global Bloodpoint soft-cap has been doubled

  • Characters can now be prestiged up to 100 times

  • Prestiging no longer removes any items, add-ons, offerings, perks, or perk slots

  • Teachable perks have been removed from the Bloodweb and have been tied to prestiging characters


    • SHRINE OF SECRETS
  • Teachable Perks have been removed from the Shrine of Secrets

  • Purchasing a Perk from the Shrine of Secrets now unlocks that Perk on all Killers / Survivors at the displayed Tier level


    • MATCHMAKING INCENTIVES
  • When the Survivor:Killer ratio in the active Matchmaking queue drifts too far from optimal, players will receive BP bonuses to enter the queue as the needed role


    • KNOWN ISSUES
  • Warrior Goddess for Feng Min has been disabled to prevent a crash.
  • Tome 12 Archive Collection video does not play properly on Stadia.
news.title: Release Patch Notes

news.description:
The Dead by Daylight team would like your feedback in a Player Satisfaction survey.

We encourage you to be as honest as possible in letting us know how you feel about the game. The information and answers provided are anonymous, not shared with any third-party, and will not be used for purposes other than survey analysis.

Access the survey HERE: www.surveymonkey.com/r/PSATg-JUN22

news.title: PLAYER SATISFACTION SURVEY

news.description:
The Rift for Tome 11: DEVOTION will close at July 7th 11AM ET.
For those without a Rift Pass, this will be the last chance to unlock it and claim any rewards you've earned on the Premium track.

Once the Rift closes the below will come into effect:
  • Challenges, Entries, and Bloodpoints from Tome 11 will remain available permanently after this date but no longer award Rift Fragments. Once the next Tome begins, Tome 11: DEVOTION will be available in the Compendium section.
  • Player Level XP will stop awarding Rift Fragments.
  • Unclaimed rewards from the Rift will be automatically claimed on your next launch of the game or tally screen, whichever comes first.
news.title: TOME 11: DEVOTION - 1 WEEK LEFT!

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 6.0.2 bugfix.

Features
  • The Dredge: Changes to visibility during Nightfall

    • Bug Fixes
  • Fixed an issue that could cause a performance drop when the Dredge teleported between lockers
  • Fixed an issue that could cause extreme environment/lighting flickering when playing against the Dredge during the Nightfall in the Autohaven Wreckers maps
  • Fixed issues related to glyphs in The Pale Rose & The Game maps
  • Multiple issues related to The Dredge fixed


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.

news.description:
Level 2 of the Twisted Masquerade's Event Tome has unlocked within The Archives.

Continue finding invitations and working with the community to earn even more event cosmetics and lore before the party ends June 30th 11:30AM ET.

Update: Many of you have wanted to contribute more towards the community challenges. We hear you! Starting with Level 2, you can contribute double the personal goal towards the community goal by keeping the challenge selected.

Heads up: The UI will not reflect any progress beyond your own goal, but we will keep this in mind when creating future events.
news.title: Twisted Masquerade - Level 2

news.description:
Come one, come all to the Twisted Masquerade, Dead by Daylight\'s 6th Anniversary event!

Featuring new Masquerade invitations to find and cosmetics to earn, this will be a bash to die for. Celebrate the festivities in fully decorated Trials, and return often for daily login rewards and massive sales on nearly every Dead by Daylight character and outfit!

Want to know everything there is to know about the event?
deadbydaylight.com/news/twistedmasquerade-anniversaryevent

Login Reward Details:
  • Earn a total of 4,500 Iridescent Shards, 900,000 Bloodpoints, and 35 Rift Fragments over the course of the event by logging in daily!


    • Anniversary Sale:
    Discounts on Auric Cell price only
  • All Characters before Sadako Rising - 50% OFF
  • The Cenobite & Mikaela Reid - 30% OFF
  • All outfits released before June 7th (Roots of Dread Chapter release): 30% OFF


    • Event, Login Gifts, and sales End Date: June 30th 11:30AM ET.

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 6.0.1 bugfix.

Bug Fixes
  • Tentatively fixed an issue that caused lag while navigating the loadout menu
  • Tentatively fixed an issue that could cause Survivors crawl speed to be higher than normal
  • Fixed an issue that could occasionally cause the game to crash when playing against the Huntress or the Trickster
  • Multiple issues related to The Dredge fixed
  • Multiple other issues fixed

    • Content
  • "Twisted Masquerade" 6th Anniversary limited-time event start time has shifted (now starting June 16th 11:30AM ET)

    • Known Issues
  • Players on console might experience crashes when starting a tutorial bot match before fully download the game. To work around the issue, wait for the game to fully downloaded before starting the tutorial bot match


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 6.0.1 BUGFIX

To thank you for your patience, Playstation players who log in between now and June 15 12PM ET will receive 350,000 Bloodpoints.

news.description:
When you hear the maddening whispers approaching, it's lights out.

The Roots of Dread take hold in Dead by Daylight's terrifying new Chapter.

Roots of Dread features a new Killer - The Dredge - a new Survivor, Haddie Kaur, and a disquieting new map: Garden of Joy.
news.title: ROOTS OF DREAD

news.description:
When you hear the maddening whispers approaching, it's lights out.

The Roots of Dread take hold in Dead by Daylight's terrifying new Chapter.

Roots of Dread features a new Killer - The Dredge - a new Survivor, Haddie Kaur, and a disquieting new map: Garden of Joy.
news.title: ROOTS OF DREAD

news.description:
Welcome to Chapter 24! Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you\'ll find.

For a full list of patch notes, please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes

FEATURES
  • New Killer - The Dredge
  • New Survivor - Haddie Kaur
  • New Map - Garden of Joy
  • New General Killer Perk - Shattered Hope
  • Layout change to the Main Menu - allows more room to gaze longingly into the campfire
  • Presets - For Loadouts & Customizations
  • The Ghost Face - Reworked Add-on - Driver\'s License
  • The Pig - Added an extra Jigsaw Box to all matches

    • CONTENT
  • Twisted Masquerade 6th Anniversary limited-time event (starting June 16th 11AM ET)
  • Twisted Masquerade Event Tome (also starting June 16th 11AM ET)

    • BUG FIXES
  • Multiple fixes for The Onryo, The Oni, The Deathslinger
  • Multiple fixes for issues related to Glyphs
  • Tentatively fixed an issue that caused EAC error 10022 when launching the game
  • Multiple issues fixed

    • KNOWN ISSUES
  • The Dredge has no animation on the match result screen if they are in a locker when the match ends
  • The Dredge\'s weapon is distorted during locker interrupts
news.title: Release Patch Notes

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 5.7.1 bugfix.

Bug Fixes
  • Fixed an issue that could sometimes cause Meg to be unable to vault in the Killer tutorial
  • Fixed an issue that caused a totem to spawn in a closed room on the second floor of the Strode House in Haddonfield
  • Fixed an issue that caused succeeding an unhook attempt right before transitioning to the struggle phase to be instantly sacrificed on a subsequent hooking
  • Fixed an issue that caused an inaccessible Green Glyph on the Car Crusher tile in the Wrecker\'s Yard map
  • Multiple other issues fixed

    • Known Issues
  • Midwich Elementary School Map & Mary\'s Letter Offering have been temporarily disabled


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 5.7.1 BUGFIX

    • Please note these release dates are subject to change. All previously unlocked levels will remain available once released but will stop providing Rift Fragments once the relevant Rift has expired.

    Sales on Tome 11 character (50% off)
  • The Twins (250 AC, was 500 AC; 4500 IS, was 9000 IS)


    • Duration: April 28th 11AM ET - May 5th 11AM ET
news.title: TOME 11: DEVOTION

news.description:
Welcome to Chapter 23.5! Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you\'ll find.

For a full list of patch notes, please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes

FEATURES
  • Visual Update for Haddonfield Map (Map is re-enabled & increased chance of encountering map during 1st week of release)
  • Hemorrhage Rework
  • Updates to Boil Over, Boon: Circle of Healing & Sloppy Butcher Perks
  • Reworks to The Legion & The Ghost Face
  • Tome 11: DEVOTION of The Archives (starts April 28th 11AM ET)

    • BUG FIXES
  • Fixed an issue that gave incorrect disconnection penalty
  • Fixed a hardlock when minimizing the Game during a Loading screen after a match
  • Multiple issues fixed

    • KNOWN ISSUES
  • The Hex: Ruin effect is cancelled when a survivor stops repairing a generator during Feral Frenzy when equipped with the Fuming Mix Tape add-on
  • When dismissing a daily ritual, an incorrect amount of reward might be displayed. This is purely visual, and does not affect the actual amount of reward you will receive. Reopening the daily ritual window should correct this.
news.title: Release Patch Notes
